closed note (near Virágvölgyi Lakópark, Szigetszentmárton) / * 2022 September 28 19:57 Mateusz Konieczny Created: https://www.openstreetmap.org/node/7197111582 / Is there drinking water available here or not? It can be water fountain, water tap, maybe even hand pump, spring and so on. / It is marked as / amenity = drinking_water / disused:amenity = drinking_water / so it is marked as both active and disused at the same time. / If it is closed during winter then seasonal=yes would be much better / * 2022 October 9 13:46 Géczi Roland Levente Resolved: Place deleted. In the indicated location, the well cannot be used for drinking water.
